nodes.name: TypesToBytes

statements.operations:
{
    let index := 0
    stack_size := add(stack_size, 1)
    loop:
    mstore(add(_output, _offst), mload(add(_input, mul(index, 32))))
    _offst := sub(_offst, 32)
    index := add(index, 1)
    jumpi(loop, lt(index, stack_size))
}
